mapper.select: SELECT expenditure_code, expenditure_information, expenditure_date, expenditure_cash_card, expenditure_card_information, expenditure_store, expenditure_category, expenditure_payment, ware_admin_id, expenditure_reg_date FROM tb_expenditure;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_expenditure ( expenditure_code, expenditure_information, expenditure_date, expenditure_cash_card, expenditure_card_information, expenditure_store, expenditure_category, expenditure_payment, ware_admin_id, expenditure_reg_date ) VALUES ( sf_newExpenditureCode(), #{expenseInfo}, #{expenseDate}, #{expenseCashCard}, #{expenseCardInfo}, #{expenseStore}, #{expenseCate}, #{expensePayment}, #{wareadminId}, CURDATE() );
